title: Luxury Townhome In Frisco! Granite,  Stainless Steel,$
posting_body: Situated on 160 acres of lush greenery and surrounded by winding bike paths and stately canals, our luxury Frisco, TX apartments offer a picturesque getaway from the hassles of daily life.
Ideal blend of convenience, luxury, location, and community.
One-bedroom, two-bedroom, and townhome floor plans.
Comfort and convenience have been thoughtfully included in every aspect, including 10-ft vaulted ceilings, modern lighting and comfortably inviting layouts.
Select the space that fits your lifestyle and make yourself right at home
Featuring smart design, filled with elegant details, modern finishes and thoughtful touches not found anywhere else.
From generous community amenities to spacious apartment layouts.
Access to Founders Hall community center
